				Line25 Sites of the Week is a weekly roundup of the most outstanding website designs that I stumble across during my every day browsing. 	<li class="item github" data-category="github" data-postdate="1298009332">
					<img src="img/github.png" alt="github" width="32" height="32" class="sourceicon" />
						pushed to master at apexskier/myfeed
<div class="details">
  

  <div class="commits">
    <ul>
      <li>
      <strong><span class="committer">Cameron Little</span></strong> committed <a href="https://github.com/apexskier/myfeed/commit/324a2b8a55dc7ff54bd0db54ec50d24f8a5d1fad">324a2b8</a>

        <div class="message">
          <blockquote>Working and looking great with Twitter, Github, YouTube, and a promote js item. Can filter by source and everything looks good. All items go into a multidimensional array and are sorted by date before being inserted into the page. The Promote JS item is inserted randomly.</blockquote>
        </div>
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</div>					<p class="datetime"><a href="https://github.com/apexskier/myfeed/compare/61f8525d42...324a2b8a55">10:08 PM Feb 17th</a></p>
			</li>

	<li class="item github" data-category="github" data-postdate="1297927351">
					<img src="img/github.png" alt="github" width="32" height="32" class="sourceicon" />
						created repository myfeed

<div class="details">
  
  <div class="message">

        PHP page that pulls items from a bunch of different services and displays them in a stream using <a href="http://twitter.com/desandro's">@desandro's</a> Isotope jQuery plugin.

  </div>
</div>
					<p class="datetime"><a href="https://github.com/apexskier/myfeed">11:22 PM Feb 16th</a></p>
			</li>

	<li class="item promotejs" data-category="promotejs" data-postdate="1297026133">
							<h3>Promote JS!</h3>
				<a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/RegExp' title='JS RegExp .source'><img src='http://static.jsconf.us/promotejsh.gif' height='150' width='180' alt='JS RegExp .source'/></a>
						<p class="datetime"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/RegExp"></a></p>
			</li>
